sentence.Network_en: The analysis indicated that current method for machining the abnormal deep ostiole has many drawback.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果表明,当前异形深小孔的加工技术存在诸多缺陷.

一般是沿果面向果柄方向爬行,当发现方向不正确时,雌蜂马上掉转身体,向榕果小孔(ostiole)方向爬行。有时,雌蜂落在榕果小孔附近,它也会直接向榕小孔处爬行。雌蜂在.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Latin ostiolum, diminutive of ostium 'opening'

means.word_mean: 1. a small pore especially one in the reproductive bodies of certain algae and fungi through which spores pass
